item.title: Leave the Munging to the Machines - MLB Edition
item.description: Summary: Create a clean, reusable qri dataset by scraping data stored in an ugly table. Rerun a script to retrieve updated data (however frequently you like) See and have the code I used to create my dataset, and feel free to fork that code and adapt to your liking. Look up the latest rankings of MLB home run leaders on baseballreference.com (the authority on MLB stats), and youâ€™ll get a table like this:
